title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Andirons", December 11, 1936
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 6378/F.S./GRAF./ANDERSON/6378/BLK. OXIDIZE/& POL. CHROME/ON STEEL; center column: F.H.S./12/11/36 / 2/4/37; right column: 12/11/36, 1, PILNY (?)/12/14/36, 1, GRAF./2/5/37, 1, GRAF./4/29/37, 1, MODERN METAL; inscribed in graphite, upper center: PIN - FORCE FIT/BLACK OXIDIZE/OR GUNMETAL /FINISH DISC ONLY/ COUNTERSUNK/SCREW/USE 2 IF NECESSARY/FOR RIGID FIT; center: POLISHED CHROME/ON COLD ROLLED STEEL/DIMENSION "A"/22 1/4"; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawings for pair of andirons. L-shaped structure in squared, flat polished chrome on steel; rounded corner and straight feet. Circular finial at top in black oxidized metal.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Andirons", December 11, 1936.
December 11, 1936. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-758.
